```{r read, include=FALSE}
# Load the data file ------------------------------------------------------

df <- read_sav("11. Taipei_all.sav", encoding = "UTF-8")

```

# 描述統計  
## 一、總體健康（Ch2）
```{r descr_Ch2, echo=FALSE}
df$Ch2 <- labelled(df$Ch2, 
                   labels = c("極好" = 1, 
                              "非常好" = 2, 
                              "好" = 3, 
                              "一般" = 4, 
                              "不好" = 5), 
                   label = "總體健康")

# descr_Ch2
a <- freq(df$Ch2, digits = 2, cum = TRUE, total = F, levels = "p", na.last = FALSE)
kable(a)



```

## 二、疾病狀況（Ch3）

```{r descr_Ch3, echo=FALSE}
# labels
df$Ch3 <- labelled(df$Ch3, 
                   labels = c("沒有" = 0, 
                              "有" = 1),  
                   label = "總體健康")
# descr_Ch3
a <- freq(df$Ch3, digits = 2, cum = T, total = F, levels = "p", na.last = FALSE)
kable(a)

```
